page.description: Combines W_upper(alltrim()) into a single function
page.original:
WUT() Syntax Output_String as C = WUT( Input_String as C ) Argument Description Output_String The processed text string. Input_String A text string to capitalize.
Description The WUT() function capitalizes the initial letter of each word in a string. Example ? wut("Now is the time") = "Now Is The Time"
See Also Character Case Functions
